name: Televoid: Out of The Loop
description:
Televoid is an online series staring Ian MacLeod on his YouTube Channel (brutalmoose). To show our appreciation of this amazing series, we've made a fan game! This game is includes the following.

  • 2D Non-Euclidean Puzzles
  • An Original Story
  • Minigames
  • Pixel Art

🛠️ Curious About The Game's Development? 🛠️

If your curious about the game's crazy 3 years of development, check out this playlist!

⚠️ IF YOU ARE HAVING ISSUES, PLEASE READ ⚠️

The game may appear as an empty zip, decompressing using 7zip works.

The game depends on OpenAL, if you don't already have it installed, you can download it here.

This game requires modern hardware to run, the engine doesn't support older hardware.

Make sure your graphics drivers are up to date!

If you are still having issues (which is very much possible), please submit it.

🌐 Source Code 🌐

Televoid: Out of The Loop was created from scratch in the C programming language. It uses the help of various libraries and APIs such as GLFW, OpenGL, OpenAL.

The game's source code is freely available on GitHub, this includes the Godot Remake!
